attributes.action: unless you have paid into the NHS system you should not recieve treatment without paying or be covered by medical insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this would free up beds and consultation availability for those who have contributed to the system all their working lives.Why should people jump the waiting list when they injure themselves trying to enter this country illegally having not paid a penny into it?

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nhsandmigrants/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
